publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-91 Mike Pringle: Electoral Registration and Victims of Domestic Abuse—That the Parliament recognises that victims of domestic abuse can become vulnerable to further abuse and intimidation through publication of their names and addresses on the publicly available electoral register; notes the House of Commons Home Affairs Select Committee’s Fourth Report 1997-98, Electoral Law and Administration, which recognised the calls for a means of registering without having to reveal information that could make the elector vulnerable, and calls on the Electoral Commission and the UK Parliament to give consideration to developing a system to allow anonymous electoral registration in exceptional circumstances, while providing safeguards against electoral fraud, as part of the general review of electoral registration.

S2M-91 Mike Pringle: Electoral Registration and Victims of Domestic Abuse—That the Parliament recognises that victims of domestic abuse can become vulnerable to further abuse and intimidation through publication of their names and addresses on the publicly available electoral register; notes the House of Commons Home Affairs Select Committee’s Fourth Report 1997-98, Electoral Law and Administration, which recognised the calls for a means of registering without having to reveal information that could make the elector vulnerable, and calls on the Electoral Commission and the UK Parliament to give consideration to developing a system to allow anonymous electoral registration in exceptional circumstances, while providing safeguards against electoral fraud, as part of the general review of electoral registration. Supported by: Mr Mark Ruskell*, Patrick Harvie*, Mark Ballard*
S2M-91 Electoral Registration and Victims of Domestic Abuse (lodged on 29 May 2003) Bristow Muldoon*, Nora Radcliffe*
S2M-91 Electoral Registration and Victims of Domestic Abuse (lodged on 29 May 2003) Mrs Margaret Smith*, Robin Harper*, Bill Butler*, Carolyn Leckie*
S2M-91 Electoral Registration and Victims of Domestic Abuse (lodged on 29 May 2003) Tommy Sheridan*
S2M-91 Electoral Registration and Victims of Domestic Abuse (lodged on 29 May 2003) Frances Curran*
S2M-91 Electoral Registration and Victims of Domestic Abuse (lodged on 29 May 2003) Donald Gorrie*
S2M-91 Electoral Registration and Victims of Domestic Abuse (lodged on 29 May 2003) Elaine Smith*
S2M-91 Electoral Registration and Victims of Domestic Abuse (lodged on 29 May 2003) Linda Fabiani*
S2M-91 Electoral Registration and Victims of Domestic Abuse (lodged on 29 May 2003) Marlyn Glen*
